title.rendered: MYR Group Ranks in Top 10 Again on ENR’s Top Specialty and Top Electrical Firms Lists

content.rendered:
NOVEMBER 7, 2019

MYR GROUP RANKS IN TOP 10 AGAIN ON TOP SPECIALTY AND TOP ELECTRICAL FIRMS LISTS

AT NO. 4, COMPANY MAKES ITS 24TH CONSECUTIVE APPEARANCE IN TOP FIVE OF TOP 50 ELECTRICAL FIRMS; AMONG TOP 600 SPECIALITY CONTRACTORS, THE FIRM LANDS AT NO. 10

MYR Group Inc. is once ranked again high on Engineering News-Record’s (ENR) Top 600 Specialty Contractors and Top 50 Electrical Firms lists – at No. 10 and No. 4, respectively. This marks its 24th consecutive year among the top five electrical firms.

ENR ranks companies according to construction revenue in 2018 from specialty contracting in a prime or subcontracting capacity.

Read more about The Top 600 Specialty Contractors by clicking here.
